Name: cement production, Portland | cement, Portland | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2394:Manufacture of cement, lime and plaster
Description: Manufacturing of OPC starts with reception of clinker at factory gate. Grinding of Clinker and Gypsum in appropriate proportion in vertical roller mill or ball mill. For this activity latest available technologies were considered like Vertical roller mill, energy efficient fans etc.
